title: Token Builder
description: Simulate JWT token structure by building a dot-separated token string with header, payload, and signature sections.
instructions: Create a function buildToken(userId, role) that returns a fake JWT-like token as 'header.payload.signature'. Print the token and extract the payload.

hints.text: A JWT has three dot-separated parts: header.payload.signature
Build each part as a simple string
Use split('.') to extract parts from the token

commonMistakes.correction: Keep it simple -- plain text parts separated by dots

commonMistakes.consequence: Split produces wrong number of parts
commonMistakes.correction: Ensure exactly two dots for three parts
Include userId and role in the payload section
